tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE fuel_consumption (
    aircraft_id INT,
    date DATE,
    fuel_type VARCHAR(50),
    fuel_quantity FLOAT,
    distance_traveled FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE Flights (
  flight_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  aircraft_id INT,
  flight_date DATE,
  fuel_consumed DECIMAL,
  FOREIGN KEY (aircraft_id) REFERENCES Aircrafts(aircraft_id)
);

CREATE TABLE aircraft (
    aircraft_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    registration_number TEXT NOT NULL,
    company_id INT REFERENCES aviation_companies(company_id),
    fuel_capacity DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    fuel_type TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE flights (
    flight_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    aircraft_id INT REFERENCES aircraft(aircraft_id),
    flight_date DATE NOT NULL,
    departure_airport TEXT NOT NULL,
    arrival_airport TEXT NOT NULL,
    fuel_consumed DECIMAL NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE Aircraft (
  aircraft_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  aircraft_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  registration_number VARCHAR(10) UNIQUE NOT NULL,
  manufacturer VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE Flights (
  flight_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  aircraft_id INT NOT NULL,
  flight_date DATE NOT NULL,
  departure_airport VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  arrival_airport VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  fuel_consumed DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE FuelTransactions (
  transaction_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  flight_id INT NOT NULL,
  transaction_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  fuel_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
  quantity DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE FuelProviders (
  provider_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  provider_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  contact_person VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  phone_number VARCHAR(15) NOT NULL,
  email VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE FuelPriceHistory (
  record_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  fuel_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
  price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
  effective_date DATE NOT NULL
)
